text: Dynamic page question: suppose I had a form that I wanted to include on a HubDB-generated dynamic page. For simplicity, I want to use the same form on each dynamic page. Can I trigger workflows based on being filled out on a specific dynamic page?

To be more concrete, this is for an events feed. Some events have a registration form. The current event setup uses a janky blog thing, and they use a single form for all of them. Would be nice if I could keep that feature.
